Articles.Title: Hark!  Welcome to my cloud.
Articles.Content: I am John Kelliher, its devoted steward. With over five years of distinguished experience as a senior computer scientist, I now lend my expertise to Microsoft, laboring upon the grand tapestry of Power Apps Studio. This enchanted website has been crafted to unveil my professional and personal triumphs, serving both as a testament to my endeavors and as a canvas for my creativity as a developer and creator. For further enlightenment, including my resume, please peruse the links gracing the navigation bar atop this hallowed wall.
